title: Stock Transfer Completed Event
description: Published when a stock transfer between warehouse locations is completed and inventory has been received at the destination. This event marks the end of the transfer lifecycle, updating location-level inventory balances. The event includes shrinkage detection by comparing expected vs actual received quantities.

transfer_id.description: Unique identifier for the transfer operation, linking all events in the transfer lifecycle (initiated -> in-transit -> completed)

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit identifier - the unique product code within the inventory system

from_location.description: Source warehouse location code in format: Warehouse-Zone-Aisle-Shelf-Bin. This location's inventory was decremented.

to_location.description: Destination warehouse location code. This location's inventory was incremented with the received quantity.

quantity_transferred.description: Actual quantity received at the destination location. May differ from originally shipped quantity due to damage, loss, or counting errors (shrinkage).

completed_by.description: User identifier (email or username) of the warehouse operator who confirmed receipt and completed the transfer

lot_number.description: Optional lot/batch number for lot-tracked inventory, maintaining traceability through the transfer
